Imports

shared, plugin, events

Types

ClapHostParams = object
  rescan*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost; flags: ClapParamRescanFlags): void {.cdecl.}
  clear*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost; param_id: ClapID;
                flags: ClapParamRescanFlags): void {.cdecl.}
  request_flush*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost): void {.cdecl.}

ClapParamClearFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  cpcALL, cpcAUTOMATIONS, cpcMODULATIONS
ClapParamClearFlags = distinct uint32
ClapParamInfo = object
  id*: ClapID
  flags*: ClapParamInfoFlags
  cookie*: pointer
  name*: array[CLAP_NAME_SIZE, char]
  module*: array[CLAP_PATH_SIZE, char]
  min_value*: float64
  max_value*: float64
  default_value*: float64

ClapParamInfoFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  cpiIS_STEPPED, cpiIS_PERIODIC, cpiIS_HIDDEN, cpiIS_READONLY, cpiIS_BYPASS,
  cpiIS_AUTOMATABLE, cpiIS_AUTOMATABLE_PER_NOTE_ID, cpiIS_AUTOMATABLE_PER_KEY,
  cpiIS_AUTOMATABLE_PER_CHANNEL, cpiIS_AUTOMATABLE_PER_PORT, cpiIS_MODULATABLE,
  cpiIS_MODULATABLE_PER_NOTE_ID, cpiIS_MODULATABLE_PER_KEY,
  cpiIS_MODULATABLE_PER_CHANNEL, cpiIS_MODULATABLE_PER_PORT,
  cpiREQUIRES_PROCESS, cpiIS_ENUM
ClapParamInfoFlags = distinct uint32
ClapParamRescanFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  cprVALUES, cprTEXT, cprINFO, cprALL
ClapParamRescanFlags = distinct uint32
ClapPluginParams = object
  count*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin): uint32 {.cdecl.}
  get_info*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; param_index: uint32;
                   param_info: ptr ClapParamInfo): bool {.cdecl.}
  get_value*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; param_id: ClapID;
                    out_value: ptr float64): bool {.cdecl.}
  value_to_text*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; param_id: ClapID;
                        value: float64; out_buffer: ptr UncheckedArray[char];
                        out_buffer_capacity: uint32): bool {.cdecl.}
  text_to_value*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; id: ClapID; display: cstring;
                        value: ptr float64): bool {.cdecl.}
  flush*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; in_events: ptr ClapInputEvents;
                out_events: ptr ClapOutputEvents): void {.cdecl.}

Consts

CLAP_EXT_PARAMS: cstring = "clap.params"
